content:
Announcing GoFSH 1.4.1 with the following enhancements:

  • Add option to generate FSH without Aliases using --no-alias flag
  • Update built-in SUSHI to v2.2.1

Note: GoFSH 1.4.0 was skipped due to an error in the release process.
To install or update to this release, run the following command:

npm install -g gofsh

For more information see the GoFSH 1.4.1 release notes
